paragraphs: The Iron Wheel is hereby authorized to bring in a Dark Elf woman, going by the name of Velsa, surname unknown, for questioning related to the stolen dowry of Lady Magnifica Falorah. Suspect is believed to have strong ties to the organization of loosely affiliated rogues and criminals that goes by "Thieves Guild"
Note: Proceed with all caution, suspect is an expert in sabotage and chemical techniques designed to immobilize and cause pain. Assume hostility.
